txt.en: There are many Warg-rider sentries riding around Madh-fushaum alert for threats or victims. You should defeat as many of them as possible.
You managed to defeat the Warg-rider sentries without the force within Madh-fushaum being alerted to your presence.
White Hand sentries are circling the perimeter of Madh-fushaum. They must be defeated before they sound an alarm, or if you need to escape quickly without risk of being pursued.
Madh-fushaum is home to an army of the White Hand's minions, and any army needs a network of sentries to alert the others of incoming threats.
The Warg-rider sentries are defeated, and the larger army is not yet alerted to your presence. You should be more easily able to slip into the camp undetected.
There are many Warg-rider sentries riding around Madh-fushaum alert for threats or victims. You should defeat as many of them as possible.
